data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Sheffield Wed get the game underway.
In the minute 46, Watford kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
The home team have replaced Matthew Penney with Liam Palmer. This is the first substitution made today by Garry Monk.
The away team replace Glenn Murray with Stipe Perica.
In the minute 65, Massimo Luongo for Sheffield Wed has been booked by Jarred Gillett and receives a first yellow card.
Sheffield Wed make their second substitution with Elias Kachunga replacing Jordan Rhodes.
Barry Bannan (Sheffield Wed) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, James Garner is replacing Domingos Quina for the away team.
Nathaniel Chalobah (Watford) gets a yellow card.
Vladan Ivic is making the team's third substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Ignacio Pussetto replacing Joao Pedro.
In the minute 85, Adam Reach is on a sub for Josh Windass for Sheffield Wed.
James Garner is booked for the away team.
That's full-time at Hillsborough Stadium. The final score is 0-0.
